about_the_game:
Antipsychotic is an eccentric art game experience. It is not a traditional video game. This is a short, abstract art game about mental health. 10 - 15 minutes playtime, nonlinear free roam.

Dive into the mind of someone with bipolar disorder as they explore their condition. This immersive experience marries poetic reflections and personal narratives with captivating audio-reactive visuals and evocative soundscapes, set to the beat of poignant music.

Antipsychotic supports up to 7.1 surround sound (capable sound card required). Antipsychotic supports the Xbox controller with newly re-tooled haptic responses. Xbox controller does not work in the settings menu, only in game.
detailed_description:
Antipsychotic is back on Steam

Antipsychotic is back on the Steam store with new updates. It now includes a new introduction sequence and a new area within its world. Antipsychotic now supports DLSS, which is activated via its in-game menu by pressing Escape. The game is now free for all to play in the hopes this experience will spread mental health awareness. If you already purchased Antipsychotic when it was 99¢ (USD), please contact me for a refund and I will happily oblige. 

Enjoy this free & updated experience!
